heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of  light rain showers, mainly far south and in the Champlain Valley. Highs in the low to mid 40s, with some upper 40s in western valleys. South winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 30 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Tonight
text: Cloudy. A mix of rain and snow, becoming all snow in the mountains, and in the valleys of far northern New York, with 2 to 4 inches; mainly rain in the valleys from the Hudson and Champlain valleys eastward. Lows in the low to mid 30s, except in the 20s in far northern New York. South winds around 10 mph, becoming west in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers west of the Greens, and over high terrain in the east, with 2 to 4 inches; a mix of rain and snow showers in eastern valleys, with a trace to an inch. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40 east of the Greens; morning highs from the upper 20s to mid 30s west, except teens to mid 20s in far northern New York. Winds from the west 5 to 15 mph in New York, elsewhere from the south 5 to 10 mph, and becoming west to northwest in the afternoon.
